title: Fulfill a FOIA Request
description: A records officer has the final, redacted documents and is ready to deliver them to the FOIA requestor.

tasks.description: Locate the FOIA request and the associated responsive documents.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer has the correct request and the final set of documents.

tasks.description: Draft a response letter to the requestor, explaining what is being provided and citing the legal exemptions used for any redactions.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer writes a clear, legally compliant response letter.

tasks.description: Deliver the letter and the documents to the requestor and close the request in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer sends the materials and updates the request status to 'Fulfilled'.
